description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) adds temporary train trips
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 高速鐵路(香港段)加開臨時列車服務

2025-12-22T17:10:00.CONTENT_EN:

• 24, 27 Dec 2025; 1, 3 Jan 2026 : G5834, G5836, G5838, G5840, G5842, G5844, G5846, G5848, G5850, G5852, G5854, G5856, G5868

2025-12-25T06:24:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to heavy traffic at the road section leading from Airport Road to Hong Kong International Airport’s Terminal 1 Departures Kerb, motorists are advised to use the drop-off area at the Airport’s Car Park 1. Members of the public heading to the Airport are advised to allow sufficient time for their journey and consider taking the Airport Express and buses.
2025-12-25T06:24:00.CONTENT_CN: 現時機場路通往香港國際機場一號客運大樓離港層落客區的路段交通繁忙，駕駛人士請考慮改用機場一號停車場落客區。前往機場的市民，請預留足夠交通時間，並考慮乘搭機場快綫或巴士。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: MTR Train service enhancement during New Year
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 港鐵新年期間加強服務

2025-12-25T08:15:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that to facilitate travel needs, train services will be enhanced with more frequent trips on several rail lines during different periods from now until 4 January. 

New Year's Eve (31 December)
•Overnight train service: all local lines (except the Airport Express, Disneyland Resort Line and journeys to or from Lo Wu and Lok Ma Chau stations on the East Rail Line) and 7 Light Rail routes
•Extended rail service hours: East Rail Line service to/from Lo Wu, Disneyland Resort Line
•Extended bus service hours: MTR Bus routes 506, K51 and K54A

Airport Express will have the following special arrangement:
•28 December and 1 January: the last train will depart from AsiaWorld-Expo Station at 1:00am the next day
•31 December: the last train will depart from AsiaWorld-Expo Station at 1:30am the next day

Please see MTRC's website for more information: https://www.mtr.com.hk/archive/ch/pdf/traffic-news/04_Train_service_enhancement_xmas_new_year_2025_M2_ENG.pdf

Crowd management measures may be implemented in stations when necessary. Please refer to the latest service updates.
2025-12-25T08:15:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，為方便大家外出，即日至1月4日期間，多條本地鐵路綫於不同時段加密班次，加強列車服務。

除夕夜（12月31日）
•通宵行駛：本地鐵路綫及7條輕鐵路綫（不包括機場快綫、迪士尼綫及東鐵綫往返羅湖及落馬洲站）
•延長鐵路服務時間：東鐵綫往返羅湖站、迪士尼綫
•延長巴士服務時間：3條巴士綫506、K51及K54A

機場快綫亦會作出以下特別安排：
•12月31日：博覽館站尾班車延至翌日凌晨01:30開出
•1月1日：博覽館站尾班車延至翌日凌晨01:00開出

詳情請參閲港鐵網頁：https://www.mtr.com.hk/archive/ch/pdf/traffic-news/05_Train_service_enhancement_xmas_new_year_2025_M2.1_CHI.pdf

部分車站在人多時或會實施客流管理措施，請留意最新車務資訊。

2025-12-25T13:55:00.CONTENT_EN: All car parks at West Kowloon Cultural District are full. Members of the public are encouraged to take public transport to the West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-12-25T13:55:00.CONTENT_CN: 西九文化區內所有停車場現已泊滿車輛，前往西九文化區一帶的市民請使用公共交通工具。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park now full
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿

2025-12-25T14:00:00.CONTENT_EN: Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park is now full. Please use public transport to reach the station.
2025-12-25T14:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿。請使用公共交通工具前往。

2025-12-25T19:05:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to the implementation of crowd control by police, vehicles on Austin Road West cannot enter Museum Drive in West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-12-25T19:05:00.CONTENT_CN: 因應警方實施人潮管制關係，於柯士甸道西的車輛不能進入西九龍文化區博物館道。

2025-12-25T19:16:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to the implementation of crowd control by police, vehicles on Nga Cheung Road (Museum Drive bound in West Kowloon Cultural District) are diverted via Austin Road West for entering Museum Drive in West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-12-25T19:16:00.CONTENT_CN: 因應警方實施人潮管制關係，於雅翔道(西九龍文化區博物館道方向)的車輛需改經柯士甸道西以進入西九龍文化區博物館道。

2025-12-25T19:32:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to the implementation of crowd control by police, vehicles on Nga Cheung Road (Museum Drive bound in West Kowloon Cultural District) are diverted via Austin Road West for entering Museum Drive in West Kowloon Cultural District. Motorists are advised to avoid driving to West Kowloon Cultural District. Members of the public planning to go to the area are advised to use public transport services as far as possible.
2025-12-25T19:32:00.CONTENT_CN: 因應警方實施人潮管制關係，於雅翔道(西九龍文化區博物館道方向)的車輛需改經柯士甸道西以進入西九龍文化區博物館道。 市民請盡量避免駕車前往西九龍文化區。市民如需前往該區，應盡量使用公共運輸服務。

2025-12-25T20:55:00.CONTENT_EN: The temporary traffic arrangement on Nga Cheung Road (Museum Drive bound in West Kowloon Cultural District) implemented earlier is now cancelled.
2025-12-25T20:55:00.CONTENT_CN: 較早前於雅翔道(西九龍文化區博物館道方向)實施的臨時交通管理措施現已取消。

2025-12-25T22:53:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following special traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR), with details as shown below: The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR is lowered from 100 km/h to 50 km/h.
2025-12-25T22:53:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於強風，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下特別交通及運輸安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路的最高車速限制由每小時100 公里降低至每小時50 公里。

2025-12-26T08:00:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to improved weather condition, the following arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR): The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR resumes to 100 km/h.
2025-12-26T08:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 因天氣情況改善，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路最高車速限制恢復為每小時100 公里。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park now full
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿

2025-12-26T09:11:00.CONTENT_EN: Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park is now full. Please use public transport to reach the station.
2025-12-26T09:11:00.CONTENT_CN: 香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿。請使用公共交通工具前往。

2025-12-26T15:07:00.CONTENT_EN: All car parks at West Kowloon Cultural District are full. Members of the public are encouraged to take public transport to the West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-12-26T15:07:00.CONTENT_CN: 西九文化區內所有停車場現已泊滿車輛，前往西九文化區一帶的市民請使用公共交通工具。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Traffic on Sai Kung Man Yee Road leading to High Island Reservoir East Dam is busy
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 萬宜水庫東壩的西貢萬宜路交通繁忙

2025-12-27T10:10:00.CONTENT_EN: The Transport Department announced that the traffic on Sai Kung Man Yee Road leading to High Island Reservoir East Dam is very busy at the moment. The operator of Green Minibus Route No. 9A has strengthened its service to cater for passenger demand. Visitors are advised to plan ahead their journeys, reserve sufficient commuting time, and be patient while queuing.
2025-12-27T10:10:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署表示，通往萬宜水庫東壩的西貢萬宜路交通現時非常繁忙，專線小巴第9A號線的營辦商已加強服務應對乘客需求。請遊人妥善計劃行程，預留充裕交通時間，同時在輪候時保持忍讓。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park now full
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿

2025-12-27T11:21:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park is now full. Please use public transport to reach the station.
2025-12-27T11:21:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿。請使用公共交通工具前往。

2025-12-27T17:00:00.CONTENT_EN: All car parks at West Kowloon Cultural District are full. Members of the public are encouraged to take public transport to the West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-12-27T17:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 西九文化區內所有停車場現已泊滿車輛，前往西九文化區一帶的市民請使用公共交通工具。
